sentences.sContent: The troops will not advance until ordered to do so .
sentences.sCn: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.sContent: Did Luke sell them? And, if so , what happened to the money?
sentences.sCn: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.sContent: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.sCn: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.sContent: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.sCn: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.sContent: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.sCn: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

phrases.pCn: 这么；非常；达到这种程度
如果是这样的话；要是这样
更是这样， 尤其如此

trans.tranOther: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated
